Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at CIT Hotels Dea Palermo, you'll be centrally located in Palermo, steps from Uditore Park and minutes from Sant'Ernesto Church. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Villa Malfitano and Cantieri Culturali alla Zisa.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 95 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of CIT Hotels Dea Palermo, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-out time is 12:00:00
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of CIT Hotels Dea Palermo, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at CIT Hotels Dea Palermo, you'll be centrally located in Palermo, steps from Uditore Park and minutes from Sant'Ernesto Church. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Villa Malfitano and Cantieri Culturali alla Zisa.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Uditore Park - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Sant'Ernesto Church - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Villa Malfitano - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Cantieri Culturali alla Zisa - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Villa Trabia - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Villino Florio - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Zisa Castle and Museum of Islamic Art - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Mormino Foundation Museum - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
English Garden - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Piazza Cappuccini - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Capuchin Catacombs - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Santa Maria di Monserrato - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Centro Teatro Danza - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Villa Martorana Genuardi - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Piccolo Teatro Patafisico - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi

The preferred airport for CIT Hotels Dea Palermo is Palermo (PMO-Punta Raisi) - 20.6 km / 12.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
